column1: Airport Kiosk represntative
column2: Key Responsibilities Identifying potential        HNI customers who walk into the Elite Desk at the airport. Giving a presentation        about the services we offer. Establish and maintain        strong relationships with clients and new prospects ( this is achieved        by following up on the leads that did not result in sales or demos),        listening to customer feedback and offering solutions. Ensuring customer data        is recorded in the CRM. Meeting daily, weekly,        and monthly targets assigned. Identifying        opportunities to cross-sell to customers who do not meet the Elite        criteria. Handling inquiries        about product, pricing, customer relations and complaints. Utilizing effective        selling approaches to meet conversion targets. Maintaining        good rapport with the member; providing the right Elite??experience and        delivering quality service. Presenting daily/weekly reports on        activities performed and key metric achievement.    Functional  Must be an exceptional        communicator  verbal and written. Good demo presentation        skills. Good visual        presentability ( Looks and Grooming) Process Knowledge  Consultative Selling        Skills  Language skills ??Excellent        communication skills in English, regional language and preferably Hindi. Business / Telephone Etiquette Willing to work in a high pressure and        constantly changing environment. Proficiency in MS-Office and video meeting        applications like Zoom, Google Meet Behavioural  Values ??Integrity ,  Respect ,        Customer Centricity Strong drive to succeed ??go getter. Good Listening Skills Executive Presence Persuasion Skills  Service Orientation Influencing Skills Strong Interpersonal Skills Emotional Maturity Self-driven   Graduate with 18 months of relevant experience with        Matrimony.com Performance Rating of C or above in the last        performance appraisal cycle Good proficiency in Hindi and English Should be willing to work in shifts        (early morning, late evening, and night shifts) and on Sundays (floating        week-off)
column11: Communication Skills, Presentation Skills, Convincing Power
